meta.description: Determine the minimum number of ships needed to transport at least 3000 containers, with constraints on ship capacities and the number of large ships relative to small ships.

sets.name: SHIP_TYPES
sets.description: Types of ships used by the company.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Container capacity for each type of ship.

vars.name: num_ships
vars.description: Number of ships of each type to be used.

objective.name: min_total_ships
objective.description: Minimize the total number of ships used.

constraints.name: container_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 3000 containers are transported.

constraints.name: large_vs_small_ships
constraints.description: The number of large ships cannot exceed the number of small ships.
